![Sviatoslav Kharuk](sviat-kharuk-photo.jpg){width=500 fig-align="center"}

Sviat completed his Bachelor in Biochemistry at Vasyl Stefanyk Precarpathian National University of Ukraine. With the Huber group, he applies and benchmarks mathematical models and deep learning methods for single-cell resolution perturbation / RNA-sequencing data from the ERC DECODE project.
